values.ctor:
<init>(dataArray: FloatArray!)
            Creates a new matrix and sets its values from the given parameter

values.desc: Returns the value for a given row and column
Return a reference to the internal array representing matrix values.
Sets the values of the matrix to those of the parameter
Sets the matrix values to identity
Sets current values to be the result of multiplying two given matrices

values.code: loadRotate(rot: Float, x: Float, y: Float, z: Float)
values.desc: Sets current values to be a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
Makes the upper 2x2 a rotation matrix of the given angle
Makes the upper 2x2 a scale matrix of given dimensions

values.code: loadScale(x: Float, y: Float, z: Float)
values.desc: Sets current values to be a scale matrix of given dimensions
Sets current values to be a translation matrix of given dimensions
Post-multiplies the current matrix by a given parameter

values.code: rotate(rot: Float, x: Float, y: Float, z: Float)
values.desc: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
Modifies the upper 2x2 of the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a rotation matrix of given angle
Modifies the upper 2x2 of the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a scale matrix of given dimensions

values.code: scale(x: Float, y: Float, z: Float)
values.desc: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a scale matrix of given dimensions

values.code: set(x: Int, y: Int, v: Float)
values.desc: Sets the value for a given row and column
Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a translation matrix of given dimensions
Sets the current matrix to its transpose
